*Q: How to align text in a table at both vertically and horizontally middle?*<br />
A: Check this: [http://tex.stackexchange.com/questions/12703/fixed-width-column-with-text-centered-in-tabular/12704#12704]. On tables, check this: [http://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/LaTeX/Tables#Column_specification_using_.3E.7B.5Ccmd.7D_and_.3C.7B.5Ccmd.7D].
